vtkplotcutplanes.cpp File Reference

cut planes through volume More...

Detailed Description

cut planes through volume

vtkplotcutplanes([HANDLE], volume, points, normals, [LUTname | colors], [config, ...])

Parameters:
[in] HANDLE (optional) explicit VTK handle
[in] volume 3 dimensional volume matrix
[in] points Nx3 matrix containing coordinates (see Points), used as plane origins
[in] normals Nx3 matrix, plane normal vectors
[in] LUTname (optional) name of the color LUT as string
[in] colors (optional) explicit color LUT (see Color Lookup Tables)
[in] config (optional) config structure (see Configuration parameters)
vtkplotcutplanes intersects a volume with the plane or planes specified by the values in points and vectors. Optionaly a color LUT can be specified by name, or as matrix. Points and vectors must be of equal length.

A color LUT is used, to map the volume data on the intersecting plane. If no name or explicit LUT is given, the default LUT is used.

Generated on Wed Sep 30 17:31:11 2009 for matVTK by  1.5.8
